glsa.title: NVIDIA Drivers: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in NVIDIA drivers may allow a local attacker to gain escalated privileges.

background.p: The NVIDIA drivers provide X11 and GLX support for NVIDIA graphic boards.

description.p: A vulnerability has been found in the way NVIDIA drivers handle read/write access to GPU device nodes, allowing access to arbitrary system memory locations.
NOTE: Exposure to this vulnerability is reduced in Gentoo due to 660 permissions being used on the GPU device nodes by default.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All NVIDIA driver users should upgrade to the latest version:
